newsitem.title: BAHRAIN: PRESS DIGEST - Saudi Arabia - March 3.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Saudi Arabia - March 3.

text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the Saudi Arabia press on Monday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Medina municipality implements 5.67 billion riyal projects to expand and develop area.
- French trade mission expresses willingness to invest in joint ventures in Saudi's agriculture and health care sectors.
- Al-Ahliyah gypsum company to pay dividend equal to 20 percent of its capital to shareholders.
- Al-Rajhi agriculture company signs projects worth 125 million riyals.
- Saudi investors to attend an economic conference in London on March 6.
